common.app-desc: Web version of the MADA reports app.
common.name: Name

medical-codes.title: Select medical code
medical-codes.not-found: No code was found for search

settings.title: Settings
settings.select-tools: Pick tools to show on tools page
settings.select-moked: Pick default MADA region, for reports page.

refresh.title: New version available
refresh.message:
Ther'e is a new version available for our web app, with new features.
The update will be available immediately.

retrieve.title: Restore previous data?
retrieve.message: We've detected you've used the contractions timer in the last 20 minutes. Should we restore the data?

a2hs.title: Add to home screen
a2hs.info:
Your browser allows installing the web page as an app.
It's completly free, and uses no extra storage!
Click here!

pulse.name: Pulse calculator
pulse.click-area: Click the grey area to start timer

metronome.name: CPR Metronome
metronome.touch: Touch the screen to start metronome

vital.name: Vital signs calculator
vital.clarify: The information brought here is based on MADA's medical literature, and may vary between patients. This information is not medical advice.

apgar.name: APGAR calculator
info: If apgar score is below 4, start CPR immediately.
If Apgar score is between 4 and 6, oxygenate the baby.
Apgar score higher than 6 is considered normal.

glazgo.name: Glasgow calculator
info: Glasgow lower than 9 is a deep coma.
A score between 9 to 12 is a moderate coma.
Glasgow 12 or higher is a light coma.

dictionary.name: Medical dictionary
dictionary.not-found: No items in dictionary match the term

forms.name: Form dictation
forms.bill-err: Bill needs to have a price
forms.price-err: Price needs to belong to a bill

contact-page.name: Contact us
contact-page.change-name-btn: Click here to change your name
contact-page.no-message-desc: No messages were sent from this account. You can send a message right here.
contact-page.seen: Your message was seen by an admin
contact-page.warning-msg:
We're app devlopers, completely unrelated to MADA, therefore don't send us emergency calls. call 101!
We're not related to the official MADA app, we cannot help eith issues there, and we can't send you medical calls.
Please help us' and contact only with issues or requests we can help you with, so we can keep our response efficient.

info-page.name: About the app
info-page.desc: About the app and the web version
info-page.section1:
This app was created by the "AtlowApps" team. All rights are reserved to Chemi@low and Itiel Atlow.
We thank Yossi Cassouto, Yochai Benita and Shakom Sacks for all their help, as well as Rabi Zohar Maman for the "Handling the deceased" pamphlet.
info-page.section2: The application was built by MADA volunteers in order to improve existing functionalities, and to create new ones, in order to improve the volunteers abilities.
info-page.section3: In case you find an error or a problem in the application, ot if you've got a question or a request for us, you may contact us via the "Contact us" page and we will do our best to respond A.S.A.P.
info-page.section4:
This application is not an official MADA app.
Any possible implication of using this app, is the complete responsibilty of the user.

privacy-page.name: Privacy policy
privacy-page.desc: The website and application's privacy policy
